roleset.name: to bloody
roleset.note: BLOOD-V NOTES: Framed by Neville based on sentences in BROWN. No VN entry. (from blood.01-v)

example.name: blood-v: passive, arg1 only
example.text: The night after [*] reading her letter about her surgeon uncle -- it musthave been late in September -- I had a vision of myself returned in ragged uniform from The Front , nearly dying , my head bandaged and blooded , and Jessica bending over me , the power of her love bringing me back to life .

roleset.name: possess/contain blood, heritage sense
roleset.note: BLOOD-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on adjectival usage in BOLT. No VNcls. (from blood.02-v)

example.name: blooded-j
example.text: basically with all this fuss about Scottish Independence in the news I 'm wondering how this bears for people who are n't 100 % ' pure blooded Scot ' for 7 generations or something.

roleset.name: to stain with or as if with a blood
roleset.note: BLOODY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bloody' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bloody.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: bloody-v: passive
example.text: `` [The reinsurance market]*-2 has been bloodied [*-2]by disasters '' in the U.S. as well as in Great Britain and Europe , says [0] [*T*-1] Thomas Rosencrants , director of research at Interstate\/Johnson Lane Inc. in Atlanta .
example.arg: by disasters '' in the U.S. as well as in Great Britain and Europe

example.name: bloody-j: passive
example.text: His hands were bloody from where he had pressed them upon his wound.
example.arg: from where he had pressed them upon his wound

roleset.name: killing, violence

mwe.map: (A / injure-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (n1 / NARG1) :manner (g / grave) :arg0-of (c / cause-01) :arg1-of (p / possible-01) :arg1 (die-01 :arg1 (n1)))

roleset.note: SHED_BLOOD-M NOTES: Added and merged by Julia during initial MWE framing
BLOODSHED-N NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to shed.xml (from bloodshed.04-n)

example.name: bloodshed-n
example.text: Nonetheless, it is the right hour to stop the bloodshed in Burma.

example.name: shed_blood-m
example.text: Our sons shed blood for democracy overseas

example.name: shed-blood-m
example.text: I would shed blood to keep this job

example.name: shed-blood-m
example.text: Next to the bloodshed of Vietnam, Iraq's is on electronic steroids.
